title: I'm sure this is simple.
content:
I thought this was calibri until recreating it! Any ideas on the font for the logo please?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [GPCA doc logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184458/http:/typophile.com/files/GPCA%20doc%20logo.jpg) | 43.86 KB |
author: loofah

comments.content:
Hello  
Maybe:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Corbel-Bold-Italic-ascender.font?text=GPca](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184458/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Corbel-Bold-Italic-ascender.font?text=GPca "http://www.whatfontis.com/Corbel-Bold-Italic-ascender.font?text=GPca")  
Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184458/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!
I think we have a winner! Thanks Alex, and for the pointer
